title: red glitch
body: red will disappear if not smite at start of game

replies.body:
I tested this bug myself and works as intended (Red will Respawn normally) 
I don't really know what happend but I think it's an isolated case or the red was just taken away by the enemy jungler.
It was warded. Red will disappear making me lose exp and fall behind in level. Only if i have a recording program to show people this.
